     <h1>

    <div id="content">
     <div id="contentleft" style="width:230px;">
      <div id="leftboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox21779903">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="21779903">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title21779903">
          <div class="bi_text">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Need help with your research?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_1" id="content21779903">
          <p>
          </p>
          <p>
           <em>
            Contact:
           </em>
           <br />
           <br />
           <a href="mailto:kcannon@muhlenberg.edu">
            Kelly Cannon
           </a>
           <br />
           Outreach and Scholarly
           <br />
           Communication Librarian,
           <br />
           Humanities &amp; Business
           <br />
           Subject Specialist
           <br />
           <br />
           phone: 484-664-3602
           <br />
           email:
           <a href="mailto:kcannon@muhlenberg.edu">
            kcannon@muhlenberg.edu
           </a>
           <br />
           <br />
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt21779903" class="boxatt">
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentcenter" style="width:520px;padding-left:0px; margin-left:0px; margin-right:8px; float:left;">
      <div id="centerboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox21779904">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="21779904">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title21779904">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Literary Criticism: Books, Chapters, and Articles
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content21779904">
          <div id="boxatt21779904" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link25261102">
              <a id="link_25261102" href="http://muhlenberg.on.worldcat.org/advancedsearch" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25261102,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Approaches to Textual Analysis', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 24009407}); ">
               Encompass
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Trexler Library's discovery service tells a) if we own a book electronically or in print, b) if a book has been reviewed in peer reviewed journals, c) what other libraries own a book.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25261094">
              <a id="link_25261094" href="http://scholar.google.com" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25261094,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Approaches to Textual Analysis', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 25261094}); ">
               Google Scholar
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Free search engine for books and journal articles in all disciplines.Links may take you to free full text, or search the library's site for full text access.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25261091">
              <a id="link_25261091" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.jstor.org/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25261091,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Approaches to Textual Analysis', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12717122}); ">
               JSTOR
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Full text of scholarly journals from most academic disciplines. Coverage is from the inception of the journal through three to five years ago. Current issues are often to be found in Project Muse (see below). Includes nearly 300 journals specific to language and literature, including American Literary History, American Quarterly, Chaucer Review, College Composition and Communication, College English, College Literature, Early American Literature, ELH, English Journal, New Literary History, Shakespeare Quarterly, Southern Literary Journal, and Yearbook of English Studies.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25261092">
              <a id="link_25261092" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=web&amp;defaultdb=mzh" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25261092,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Approaches to Textual Analysis', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12717120}); ">
               MLA International Bibliography
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Premier scholarly index, with numerous links to full text, to criticism in the areas of literature, language, linguistics, film studies, and folklore, published from 1920-present.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentright" style="width:209px;float:left; padding-right:0px;">
      <div id="profile5771207" class="profile_wrapper">
      </div>
      <div id="rightboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox21779905">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="21779905">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title21779905">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Citing Sources
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content21779905">
          <div id="boxatt21779905" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link25261097">
              <a id="link_25261097" href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/research/citation-guides.html" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25261097,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Approaches to Textual Analysis', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 25261097}); ">
               Trexler Library Citation Guides
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Brief, easy-to-use guides to the 3 most used citation styles: APA, Chicago (Turabian), MLA.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25261098">
              <a id="link_25261098" href="http://www.zotero.org/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25261098,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Approaches to Textual Analysis', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 25261098}); ">
               Zotero
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Free citation tool. Does the citing for you! Loved by librarians, professors, and students alike.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25261099">
              <a id="link_25261099" href="https://owl.english.purdue.edu/owl/resource/614/03/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25261099,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Approaches to Textual Analysis', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 25261099}); ">
               Annotated Bibliography Samples
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               For help in writing annotated bibliographies, visit Purdue's Online Writing Lab for a definition and examples of an annotated bibliography.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox21779912">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="21779912">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title21779912">
          <div class="bi_text">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Interlibrary Loan
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_1" id="content16951423">
          Most any item not immediately available in our library or in the research databases can be requested on
          <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/services/interlibrary-loan.html">
           interlibrary loan
          </a>
          by filling out the appropriate form for
          <a href="https://library.muhlenberg.edu/illj~S0">
           articles
          </a>
          or
          <a href="https://library.muhlenberg.edu/illb~S0">
           books
          </a>
          .
          <div id="boxatt16951423" class="boxatt">
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>
